data.name: Scuffed Party
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to the party! Here we have everything from the classic board game to the Scuffed Card match! Play with yourself or with up to 4 people in frantic and fun online multiplayer battles! Will you be able to conquer the party?

PARTY MODE!
This is the heart of the Scuffed Party! You and three other foes will be duking it out for the crown. The aim is simple. Make your way around the board and collect Bhop Dollars, as you wonder around the board, you will face many different special events that will shake up who is in control of all of the money. While fighting for money, you can make your way to a Shop or a Ticket.

Aim
In order to win in party mode you need to receive 10 Tickets from the board, which you can buy from the shop, find scattered around the board, or you can steal tickets from other people! When you receive 10 Tickets you can go to the exchange centre on each map and exchange 10 Tickets for a Golden Bean Replica, which will end the game.

Shops
The shop is a place where you buy items in order to help shift the tide of the game, in the shop you can buy items that enhance your roll, harm other players, or buy your own tickets.

Characters
When you pick a character, they all come with their own special abilities and passive abilities, Passive abilities are triggered when you roll a certain number, this will either enhance your roll or do another minor ability. Special abilities are used with an item, the Special Tokens. Which allows you to use a more powerful special ability in order to gain an advantage over your foes.

Characters Include
- Scuffed Bean
- Obama
- Michael the Janitor
- Jessica
- 4 more!

Maps
- Pog City
- Scuffed Forest
- Bean Desert

Other Modes
Apart from the main Party Mode, we have a Card Game, and a few other modes which we will be revealing in our discord server closer to launch, but they will be jam packed and will bring heat to the party!

Work your way up and become the champion of Scuffed!

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Recommended:

  • Processor: Intel i7-6700 or AMD Ryzen 3 2200G or above.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1050 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
